title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-7.10 - Required records of tissue acquisition, testing, processing and storage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-7.10 - Required records of tissue acquisition, testing, processing and storage

State Regulations

In addition to the recordkeeping requirements of Subpart 52-2 of this Part, each eye bank must maintain tissue records which include: (a) documentation of gross ocular tissue evaluation; and
(b) documentation of slit-lamp examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-7.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
